Issue.creator: avkrishnan
Issue.summary: decide what we'll do to get CII badge
Issue.description: Hyperledger security folks are recommending that we implement a number of best practices in our github management and our build process that lead to people having greater trust in the binary artifacts that we ultimately release. The formal spec for this body of best practices is located here:https://github.com/linuxfoundation/cii-best-practices-badgeI recommend that we analyze these best practices and create individual tickets for many or all of the items that we are not yet doing. This is not stuff required for minimal go live, but may have a bearing on whether we graduate from "incubator" to "full project" status in Hyperledger.
